channel.title: Sanctuary, Not Quite Yet...One Last Thing!
channel.description:
Hello Everyone, Finally, after talking with the LinkSys support staff I got my router running did a tutorial, and now my port is open. I'm using Devolution X as my base. Well, I think it's my base anyways, it's the server I'm running. My question is, with No-Ip DUC running the "runserver.bat" loaded telling me it's on port 43594 1,000 people max, how do I get into my game make an account and start playing with my friends? How do my friends get into the game? I was thinking I need a client, but where do I get it?
Thanks Much, C. Negatory

item.title: Sanctuary, Not Quite Yet...One Last Thing!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Captain. You need common sence. You get a source get a client that matches your source and run it and log in

Read full topic
item.source: Sanctuary, Not Quite Yet...One Last Thing!
